verses.verse: Now <S%H6258><s%> gather thyself in troops, <S%H1413><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of troops: <S%H1416><s%> he hath laid <S%H7760><s%> siege <S%H4692><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us: they shall smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> the judge <S%H8199><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with a rod <S%H7626><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the cheek. <S%H3895><s%>

But thou, <S%H859><s%> Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%> Ephratah, <S%H672><s%> though thou be <S%H1961><s%> little <S%H6810><s%> among the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> yet out of <S%H4480><s%> thee shall he come forth <S%H3318><s%> unto me that is to be <S%H1961><s%> ruler <S%H4910><s%> in Israel; <S%H3478><s%> whose goings forth <S%H4163><s%> have been from of old, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6924><s%> from everlasting. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H5769><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> will he give them up, <S%H5414><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> that she which travaileth <S%H3205><s%> hath brought forth: <S%H3205><s%> then the remnant <S%H3499><s%> of his brethren <S%H251><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And he shall stand <S%H5975><s%> and feed <S%H7462><s%> in the strength <S%H5797><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in the majesty <S%H1347><s%> of the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> his God; <S%H430><s%> and they shall abide: <S%H3427><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> shall he be great <S%H1431><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And this <S%H2088><s%> man shall be <S%H1961><s%> the peace, <S%H7965><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> the Assyrian <S%H804><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> into our land: <S%H776><s%> and when <S%H3588><s%> he shall tread <S%H1869><s%> in our palaces, <S%H759><s%> then shall we raise <S%H6965><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him seven <S%H7651><s%> shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> principal <S%H5257><s%> men. <S%H120><s%>

And they shall waste <S%H7489><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Nimrod <S%H5248><s%> in the entrances <S%H6607><s%> thereof: thus shall he deliver <S%H5337><s%> us from <S%H4480><s%> the Assyrian, <S%H804><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> he cometh <S%H935><s%> into our land, <S%H776><s%> and when <S%H3588><s%> he treadeth <S%H1869><s%> within our borders. <S%H1366><s%>

And the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> as a dew <S%H2919><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as the showers <S%H7241><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the grass, <S%H6212><s%> that <S%H834><s%> tarrieth <S%H6960><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> for man, <S%H376><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> waiteth <S%H3176><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>

And the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> among the Gentiles <S%H1471><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> as a lion <S%H738><s%> among the beasts <S%H929><s%> of the forest, <S%H3293><s%> as a young lion <S%H3715><s%> among the flocks <S%H5739><s%> of sheep: <S%H6629><s%> who, <S%H834><s%> if <S%H518><s%> he go through, <S%H5674><s%> both treadeth down, <S%H7429><s%> and teareth in pieces, <S%H2963><s%> and none <S%H369><s%> can deliver. <S%H5337><s%>
Thine hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be lifted up <S%H7311><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> thine adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thine enemies <S%H341><s%> shall be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>

And it shall come to pass <S%H1961><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> thy horses <S%H5483><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee, and I will destroy <S%H6><s%> thy chariots: <S%H4818><s%>
And I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of thy land, <S%H776><s%> and throw down <S%H2040><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thy strongholds: <S%H4013><s%>
And I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> witchcrafts <S%H3785><s%> out of thine hand; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and thou shalt have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more soothsayers: <S%H6049><s%>

Thy graven images <S%H6456><s%> also will I cut off, <S%H3772><s%> and thy standing images <S%H4676><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee; and thou shalt no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> worship <S%H7812><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of thine hands. <S%H3027><s%>
And I will pluck up <S%H5428><s%> thy groves <S%H842><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> of thee: so will I destroy <S%H8045><s%> thy cities. <S%H5892><s%>

And I will execute <S%H6213><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> in anger <S%H639><s%> and fury <S%H2534><s%> upon <S%H853><s%> the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> such as <S%H834><s%> they have not <S%H3808><s%> heard. <S%H8085><s%>
